<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Librarian](/NPCs.aspx?ID=947)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Keepers of knowledge, librarians document discoveries, events, and laws. The best librarians record events twice; once for public record, and again to record how events truly unfolded. A librarian typically knows four to six additional languages, often including [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4) and [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2). A librarian is a 3rd-level challenge for encounters involving research.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Librarian](/NPCs.aspx?ID=947)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 240</row>

**Perception** +7

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Academia Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +11, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +9, [Library Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +13, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +8, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +1

**Con** +0

**Int** +4

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Methodical Research** ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) When [Searching](/Actions.aspx?ID=519) through stacks of books, a librarian can find the answer to almost any question. This allows the librarian to use [Library Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) in place of other lore skills, given enough time. The GM determines the DC of the check and the amount of time it takes (typically, a librarian can attempt three or four checks during 1 day of downtime).

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), [Writing Set](/Equipment.aspx?ID=63)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 13 

**Fort** +2 

**Ref** +3 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 6

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
book +4 ([Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d4 bludgeoning

**Melee**

fist +3 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d4 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
book +5 ([Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d4 bludgeoning

</column>
